verses.verse: וְאֵ֛לֶּה <S%H428><s%> now these אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which נָחֲל֥וּ <S%H5157><s%> inherited בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And these [are the countries] which the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כְּנָ֑עַן <S%H3667><s%> of Canaan אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which נִֽחֲל֜וּ <S%H5157><s%> distributed for inheritance אוֹתָ֗ם <S%H853><s%> אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <S%H499><s%> which Eleazar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priest וִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> and Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֔וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun וְרָאשֵׁ֛י <S%H7218><s%> and the heads אֲב֥וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> of the tribes לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

בְּגוֹרַ֖ל <S%H1486><s%> By lot נַחֲלָתָ֑ם <S%H5159><s%> [was] their inheritance כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> of Moses לְתִשְׁעַ֥ת <S%H8672><s%> for the nine הַמַּטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> tribes וַחֲצִ֥י <S%H2677><s%> and [for] the half הַמַּטֶּֽה׃ <S%H4294><s%> tribe

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for נָתַ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> had given מֹשֶׁ֜ה <S%H4872><s%> For Moses נַחֲלַ֨ת <S%H5159><s%> the inheritance שְׁנֵ֤י <S%H8147><s%> of two הַמַּטּוֹת֙ <S%H4294><s%> tribes וַחֲצִ֣י <S%H2677><s%> and an half הַמַּטֶּ֔ה <S%H4294><s%> tribe מֵעֵ֖בֶר <S%H5676><s%> on the other side לַיַּרְדֵּ֑ן <S%H3383><s%> Jordan וְלַ֨לְוִיִּ֔ם <S%H3881><s%> but unto the Levites לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not נָתַ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> he gave נַחֲלָ֖ה <S%H5159><s%> none inheritance בְּתוֹכָֽם׃ <S%H8432><s%> among

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הָי֧וּ <S%H1961><s%> become בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> For the children יוֹסֵ֛ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> were two מַטּ֖וֹת <S%H4294><s%> tribes מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> Manasseh וְאֶפְרָ֑יִם <S%H669><s%> and Ephraim וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not נָתְנוּ֩ <S%H5414><s%> therefore they gave חֵ֨לֶק <S%H2506><s%> no part לַלְוִיִּ֜ם <S%H3881><s%> unto the Levites בָּאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo עָרִים֙ <S%H5892><s%> save cities לָשֶׁ֔בֶת <S%H3427><s%> to dwell וּמִ֨גְרְשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <S%H4054><s%> [in] with their suburbs לְמִקְנֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H4735><s%> for their cattle וּלְקִנְיָנָֽם׃ <S%H7075><s%> and for their substance

כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֤ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> As the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses כֵּ֥ן <S%H3651><s%> Thus עָשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> did בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> so the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וַֽיַּחְלְק֖וּ <S%H2505><s%> and they divided אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> the land פ

וַיִּגְּשׁ֨וּ <S%H5066><s%> came בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> Then the children יְהוּדָ֤ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <S%H3091><s%> unto Joshua בַּגִּלְגָּ֔ל <S%H1537><s%> in Gilgal וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> and כָּלֵ֥ב <S%H3612><s%> and Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְפֻנֶּ֖ה <S%H3312><s%> of Jephunneh הַקְּנִזִּ֑י <S%H7074><s%> the Kenezite אַתָּ֣ה <S%H859><s%> You יָדַ֡עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> unto him Thou knowest אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָר֩ <S%H1697><s%> the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אִישׁ־ <S%H376><s%> the man הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> of God עַ֧ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֹדוֹתַ֛י <S%H182><s%> concerning me וְעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֹדוֹתֶ֖יךָ <S%H182><s%> and thee בְּקָדֵ֥שׁ בַּרְנֵֽעַ׃ <S%H6947><s%> in Kadeshbarnea

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <S%H705><s%> Forty שָׁנָ֜ה <S%H8141><s%> years אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I בִּ֠שְׁלֹחַ <S%H7971><s%> sent מֹשֶׁ֨ה <S%H4872><s%> [was] I when Moses עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> the servant יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֹתִ֛י <S%H853><s%> מִקָּדֵ֥שׁ בַּרְנֵ֖עַ <S%H6947><s%> me from Kadeshbarnea לְרַגֵּ֣ל <S%H7270><s%> to espy out אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land וָאָשֵׁ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> again אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> דָּבָ֔ר <S%H1697><s%> him word כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> after עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> as in לְבָבִֽי׃ <S%H3824><s%> as [it was] in mine heart

וְאַחַי֙ <S%H251><s%> Nevertheless my brethren אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who עָל֣וּ <S%H5927><s%> that went up עִמִּ֔י <S%H5973><s%> with הִמְסִ֖יו <S%H4529><s%> melt אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> with me made the heart הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> of the people וְאָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I מִלֵּ֔אתִי <S%H4390><s%> but I wholly אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> followed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> my God

וַיִּשָּׁבַ֣ע <S%H7650><s%> sware מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> on that day הַהוּא֮ <S%H1931><s%> he לֵאמֹר֒ <S%H559><s%> saying אִם־ <S%H518><s%> lo לֹ֗א <S%H3808><s%> not הָאָ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> Surely the land אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> which דָּרְכָ֤ה <S%H1869><s%> have trodden רַגְלְךָ֙ <S%H7272><s%> whereon thy feet בָּ֔הּ לְךָ֨ תִֽהְיֶ֧ה <S%H1961><s%> become לְנַחֲלָ֛ה <S%H5159><s%> shall be thine inheritance וּלְבָנֶ֖יךָ <S%H1121><s%> and thy children's עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֑ם <S%H5769><s%> ever כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> because מִלֵּ֔אתָ <S%H4390><s%> because thou hast wholly אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> followed יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> my God

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now הִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> behold הֶחֱיָ֨ה <S%H2421><s%> hath kept me alive יְהוָ֣ה ׀ <S%H3068><s%> And now behold the LORD אוֹתִי֮ <S%H853><s%> כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> when דִּבֵּר֒ <S%H1696><s%> as he said זֶה֩ <S%H2088><s%> these אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <S%H705><s%> these forty וְחָמֵ֜שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five שָׁנָ֗ה <S%H8141><s%> years מֵ֠אָז <S%H227><s%> even since דִּבֶּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַדָּבָ֤ר <S%H1697><s%> this word הַזֶּה֙ <S%H2088><s%> this אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> when הָלַ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> wandered יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> while [the children of] Israel בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness וְעַתָּה֙ <S%H6258><s%> and now הִנֵּ֣ה <S%H2009><s%> behold אָנֹכִ֣י <S%H595><s%> I הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> and now lo I [am] this day בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old חָמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> and five וּשְׁמוֹנִ֖ים <S%H8084><s%> fourscore שָׁנָֽה׃ <S%H8141><s%> years

עוֹדֶ֨נִּי <S%H5750><s%> I am still הַיּ֜וֹם <S%H3117><s%> this day חָזָ֗ק <S%H2389><s%> As yet I [am as] strong כַּֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> I בְּי֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [I was] in the day שְׁלֹ֤חַ <S%H7971><s%> sent אוֹתִי֙ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> that Moses כְּכֹ֥חִי <S%H3581><s%> me as my strength אָ֖ז <S%H227><s%> was then וּכְכֹ֣חִי <S%H3581><s%> [was] then even so [is] my strength עָ֑תָּה <S%H6258><s%> is now לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> now for war וְלָצֵ֥את <S%H3318><s%> both to go out וְלָבֽוֹא׃ <S%H935><s%> and to come in

וְעַתָּ֗ה <S%H6258><s%> Now תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> Now therefore give לִּי֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָהָ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> me this mountain הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> this אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> whereof the LORD בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אַתָּֽה־ <S%H859><s%> you שָׁמַעְתָּ֩ <S%H8085><s%> for thou heardest בַיּ֨וֹם <S%H3117><s%> in that day הַה֜וּא <S%H1931><s%> he כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> that עֲנָקִ֣ים <S%H6062><s%> how the Anakims שָׁ֗ם <S%H8033><s%> there וְעָרִים֙ <S%H5892><s%> [were] there and [that] the cities גְּדֹל֣וֹת <S%H1419><s%> [were] great בְּצֻר֔וֹת <S%H1219><s%> [and] fenced אוּלַ֨י <S%H194><s%> if so be יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אוֹתִי֙ <S%H854><s%> [will be] with וְה֣וֹרַשְׁתִּ֔ים <S%H3423><s%> me then I shall be able to drive them out כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> which דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> said יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD

וַֽיְבָרְכֵ֖הוּ <S%H1288><s%> blessed יְהוֹשֻׁ֑עַ <S%H3091><s%> And Joshua וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <S%H5414><s%> him and gave אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> חֶבְר֛וֹן <S%H2275><s%> Hebron לְכָלֵ֥ב <S%H3612><s%> unto Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְפֻנֶּ֖ה <S%H3312><s%> of Jephunneh לְנַחֲלָֽה׃ <S%H5159><s%> for an inheritance

עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and כֵּ֣ן <S%H3651><s%> after that הָיְתָֽה־ <S%H1961><s%> became חֶ֠בְרוֹן <S%H2275><s%> Hebron לְכָלֵ֨ב <S%H3612><s%> of Caleb בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְפֻנֶּ֤ה <S%H3312><s%> of Jephunneh הַקְּנִזִּי֙ <S%H7074><s%> the Kenezite לְֽנַחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> therefore became the inheritance עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> until הַיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this יַ֚עַן <S%H3282><s%> because אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> after מִלֵּ֔א <S%H4390><s%> because that he wholly אַחֲרֵ֕י <S%H310><s%> followed יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְשֵׁ֨ם <S%H8034><s%> And the name חֶבְר֤וֹן <S%H2275><s%> of Hebron לְפָנִים֙ <S%H6440><s%> before קִרְיַ֣ת אַרְבַּ֔ע <S%H7153><s%> [was] Kirjatharba הָאָדָ֧ם <S%H120><s%> man הַגָּד֛וֹל <S%H1419><s%> [which Arba was] a great בָּעֲנָקִ֖ים <S%H6062><s%> among the Anakims ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְהָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> And the land שָׁקְטָ֖ה <S%H8252><s%> had rest מִמִּלְחָמָֽה׃ <S%H4421><s%> from war פ
